$$
\text{ES}_{folded} = \text{SE}\sqrt{\frac{2}{\pi}} \exp\left({\frac{\text{ES}^2}{2\text{SE}^2}}\right)+\text{ES}\left[1-2\Phi\left(-\frac{\text{ES}}{\text{SE}}\right) \right]
$$
$$
\text{SE}^2_{folded} = \text{ES}^2 + \text{SE}^2 - \text{ES}_{folded}^2
$$
